General.Name: Myriad Uranium Corp.
General.Description: Myriad Uranium Corp. operates as a uranium mineral exploration company in Africa. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in 1,822 square kilometers of uranium exploration licenses in the Tim Mersoi Basin, Niger. It also holds a 50% interest in the Millen Mountain property, which comprises 80 mineral claims covering approximately 1,280 hectares located in the province of Nova Scotia. The company was formerly known as Myriad Metals Corp. and changed its name to Myriad Uranium Corp. in December 2022. Myriad Uranium Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
